程序包 jack.task

类 Event

java.lang.Object
jack.task.Task
jack.task.Event
public class Event extends Task
Represents an event task, which is a type of task with a specific start and end time. Extends the Task class.

  • 字段概要

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Event

      public Event(String description, String start, String end)
      Constructs a new Event task with the specified description, start time, and end time.
      参数:
      description - The description of the event task.
      start - The start time of the event task.
      end - The end time of the event task.

  • 方法详细资料

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the event task.
      覆盖:
      toString 在类中 Task
      返回:
      A string containing the task type, status icon, description, start time, and end time.

    • taskName

      public String taskName()
      Returns the task type name for event tasks.
      覆盖:
      taskName 在类中 Task
      返回:
      "E" for event tasks.

    • taskToEvent

      public static Event taskToEvent(String task) throws Excep
      Creates a new Event task from the given task string.
      参数:
      task - The task string containing the description, start time, and end time.
      返回:
      A new Event task with the specified description, start time, and end time.
      抛出:
      Excep - If the task string is empty or does not contain "from" or "to".

    • toTask

      public String toTask()
      Returns the task information as a string for storage.
      覆盖:
      toTask 在类中 Task
      返回:
      A string containing the description, start time, and end time of the task.

      public String getStart()
      Returns the start time of the event task.

      The start time of the event task.

    • getEnd

      public String getEnd()
      Returns the end time of the event task.
      返回:
      The end time of the event task.
